desc: ClarityRx takes a direct approach to your skin, using pure pharmaceutical quality ingredients without unnecessary and harsh chemical additives. We believe beautiful skin means healthy skin and create plant-based, results-driven skincare with zero tradeoffs in terms of safety or efficacy.

layout.text: Balm It Off™ Nutrient Rich Pre-Cleanse
Use code POWERUP with any order $125+ and receive a free Pucker Power™ 3-in-1 Plumping Lip Treatment
